Name: The Firelord
About the game: The Lord of Fire is a platformer arena that tells of the adventures of a fiery magician. The native kingdom of our heroine was destroyed by a powerful fire mage. You can save the once prosperous kingdom. Challenge the strongest magicians of fire! Intuitive gameplay Many magic skills Development improvements Create your build! [/] Choose the right skills for your playing style!
